content: {me}, your house... it looks even more magnificent now!

I've been thinking about the perfect furniture combinations lately,
The "Dreamhome" collection series
Has given me so much inspiration!

I absolutely adore how these wallpapers and floors go together!
Have you tried mixing and matching different combinations?

Changing to a completely different style of wallpaper and flooring
can give you a whole new living experience.
It's such an amazing feeling~

When decorating your new home,
try experiencing the ambiance under different lightingâ€”
you might discover something wonderful!
